A dagger designed by a legendary swordsman.
An obscure dagger handed down from the Moon dynasty.
This strange dagger raises defensive strength.
An unsually shaped ring sword that only the first class swordsmen of the ancient kingdom could handle. The sound of it piercing the wind makes their own army tremble with fear.
A dagger so sharp that those who wield it believe it can cut through shadows. The dagger's weight is nearly finite, the lightest of its kind.
A rare dagger that generates its own heat. Due to its unique ability, it is very popular in the colder regions. The dagger as a weapon is not very strong, but it is known for its shamanistic powers.
A unique sword designed by a legendary swordsman.
An obscure sword handed down from the Moon dynasty.
A light wooden sword suitable for beginners practicing swordsmanship.
A gruesome looking iron hammer. It is powerful, but slow, heavy and hard to handle.
A sword that assumedly used for ancient traditional ceremonies. The blade is not made of iron but some mystery metal and despite for its old age, the blade hasn't lost its sharpness.
Golden Dragon Dual Sword, used by the highest officers, designed to intimidate enemies of the Empire. (Designed by Bak4Maru from NA GunZ)

A sword made of mystical black iron only found at the mountain areas of southern mainland. The unique refinery technique of black iron made the thunder bird shape on the sword. (Designed by jin_sd from KR GunZ)
Ultimate weapon that can flush anything. It strikes both mind and body.
Ultimate weapon that can flush anything. It strikes both mind and body.
The sword that has the soul of a legendary guitarist of Astra. The sound from the hilt drives people wild and even a slight touch of the blade can be deadly. (Designed by ROOT from JAPAN GunZ)

An odd shaped katana made from the bones of the black dragon. The Black Dragon Sword is difficult to manage and requires much strength to control, maybe due to the dragon’s grudge; however, once controlled its power is astonishing.
A powerful and epic saw-blade sword that reigns destruction upon anyone in its path. Its only defect is its heavy weight.
A Knight's Sword of the Axium Empire made with an extremely light alloy. This sword represents justice, tradition, and with its sturdy guard handle allows for defensive agility.
(Dual Wield) These pistols are mainly used by novice adventurers.
(Dual Wield) These strange pistols raise AP for the person who wears it.
(Dual Wield) These are pistols that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
(Dual Wield) Pistols used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
This reconstructed gun has the same rapid-fire speed of a pistol as well as the strong firepower of a revolver. Its big size and recoil make it hard to control, but its firepower is indisputable.
The Axium Empire knights' pistol. This weapon was widely regarded as a symbol of justice. The spread wings that grace the barrel are said to protect the shooter while shooting.
The future of dual-pistol technology is upon us. The Time Induced Shot (TIS) pistol appeared from the underworld through unknown sources.
(Dual Wield) Revolvers that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
(Dual Wield) Revolvers used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
(Dual Wield) The most powerful revolvers of their class. Developed mainly focusing on firepower. It is difficult for beginners to use it due to it's slow firing rate and strong recoil.
A pair of revolver which use Magnum bullets to enhance the fire power. In order to reduce the recoil and increase the continuous shooting power, the size of the gun is augmented to raise the weight.
A powerful pistol created by a famous gunsmith from the Midwest part of Astra. (Designed by Müller Pereira from Brazil GunZ)
A weapon that shoots arrows using the catapult. It is remodeled to improve the revolver's control ability.
(Dual Wield) SMGs mainly used by novice adventurers. It seems that merchants remodel the Renard's Magazine illegally and then sell them on the black market.
(Dual Wield) SMGs that the Republic's soldiers used to use.
(Dual Wield) SMGs used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
An industrial tool reformed for military use. It has strong damage but slow consecutive shot speed.
Latest SMG developed by Adam Industry. The gun’s muzzle is split to implement overwhelming fire power. Due to insufficient supply, this weapon is currently extremely rare.
Shotgun that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
Shotgun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
A unknown foreign country developed this shotgun. It looks a little too light as a weapon, but the gun has great capability which comes from its light weight.
A shotgun with enhanced power from the Breaker series. Fire rate and stability are relatively decreased, thus making it hard to control this gun.
The gun's inner structure is remarkably altered for faster continuous shooting and high bullet charge. Such attempt has named the weapon as 'Pioneer.'
Updated version of an old model which was once quite popular. It has extreme destructive power, but is rather difficult to control.
[Rare] Limited Edition of remodeled “Arquebus”. The ammunition capacity for one clip has increased, but is rather difficult to control.
A new and unique shotgun with a powerful spray. This new model allows for an extremely large clip. The only drawback is its weight.
Rifle that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
Rifle used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
A rifle focused on fire rate and stability. Its stable and controllable recoil makes it an excellent choice to use.
The test model which has been developed secretly at Walcom Company. In order to reduce the weight and increase the bullet charge, the newest high technology is introduced to the weapon.
Machine Gun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
The latest machine gun model by Adam Heavy Industry. The gun is easy to use and possesses heavy fire power with fully automatic shooting. Its only defect is its heavy weight.
A rocket the Republic soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
A rocket produced for the Iron Crow. Used to dominate Havani, city of outlaws.
A more balanced rocket launcher. Its damage is somewhat sacrificed but the clip capacity and the reload speed have been improved.
A latest model weapon identified to be created confidentially at Harvani, the city of outlaws. (Designed by Ryo ^1Shintenzu/Shikamaru ^0from NA GunZ)
A rocket launcher in the shape of Jaws, the shark. Its performance is dreadfully powerful.
Latest model of the Breaker 9 series, made by Rionix. No major changes in ability, but the level restriction got lowered.
A stray rocket launcher that can carry more rockets than a normal rocket launcher. It is lighter and does less damage.
Rocket Launcher with the new Optimite warhead. The weight of the warhead is low, which increases the maximum number of missiles fired.

Shoes worn by those who worship Scrider, the demented god of destruction.
Icarus Shoes worn by the airplane pilots from Ares who fly across the Astra continent.

Highly customized boots worn by the Xian Tactical Assassin Unit (XTA). Their unit is recognized for their high moral conviction and swift execution of a “higher law”, earning them the title: “The Shadows of Justice”. (Designed by Ryo Shintenzu/Shikamaru from NA GunZ)
Yellow Kung fu shoes that carry the soul of a legendary Kung fu fighter which makes one feel like a Kung fu master.
Heavy Metal Shoes for free souls who enjoy traveling wherever.
Boots for the chosen one who has received the supreme call from the divine being. (Designed by Nhu Tu/ Wing Age from NA GunZ)
Formal shoes worn by the young women of noble families in Axium Empire.
Pure white wedding shoes of every girl's dream, in cheerful minimal style.
Uniform shoes worn by the navy army soldiers of the Republic of Travia.
Traditional boots of the Yohawk clan who have fought vigorously against the merge with the Republic during the foundation of the Republic of Travia.
Shoes worn by the disciples of Ramitz during the renaissance of forgetting magic flourished by Ramitz.
Angel's sandals worn by the young ladies to celebrate the Independence Day of the Empire.
Shoes worn by the Police officers who ensure the safety of the republic of Travia.

Women's "Fenrir" special forces combat uniform, who's job is to guard the President of Travia. A solid and top quality made shoes with top priority given to high defensive power for the protection of the wearer.
White winter boots that are great for a snowy day. (Women)
Shoes of Sun Rang, a private group of the daughters of nobility who devote their training to a healthy mind and body.
Woman’s long boots for the formal meeting of the Axium hitmen, who are the best assassins of underworld for never missing the target and leaving no trace.
Women's high heels for Travia Cryinghawks, a mercenary clan. The members of this clan value honor and social justice, and are admired by other mercenaries.
Women's boots for Axium Soulreaper, the cleric of Republican church who absorbs possessed souls and cures the sick patients.
Women's formal boots for the high-class Soulreapers who have been elevated by curing the souls of one thousand people.
The official boots for the preachers of the Travia church, who are determined to make justice a reality by spreading the word of God and punishing heathens.
Long boots of the Empire navy’s worst enemy,the Shark Teeth, who had power over the Astra ocean. They have made the people of sea tremble with fear with their ferociousness and cruelty.
Boots worn by the cowgirls, who pioneered the barren and untapped territory of the western continent of Astra.
Women’s shoes for the assassin members of Rebel Agent, who are mysterious even to the Empire Information Division.
A woman’s shoes for members of the Black Dragon Clan, an alliance of merchants and hunters who have risen to fight against the tyranny of the corrupt Establishment.
Shoes for the Tactical Ninja, a special combat group that has been secretly working for the Republic for Travia from a remote location.
Greaves worn by those who dedicated themselves as Knights. These brave Knights swore allegiance to those who shared common beliefs and a common faith. (Designed by Radiate from NA GunZ)
Diving boots for the Deep Blue SEAL, a special forces team of the Republic of Travia who perform their duty deep under water.
Casual sneakers for the hipsters of the Hunter Alliance. They provide excellent defense but are suprisingly heavy.
Sneakers worn by the members of the Travia Republic’s famous gang, the Travian Heathen Underground.
Boots worn by Eskimo hunters from the Artic region of Northern Astra. The boots are great for keeping your feet dry, but more importantly it's heavy on defense.
Shoes worn by the disciples who fought against Ramitz to stop his rampage of corruption. Ramitz is the magician who once flourished during the Renaissance of the Forgotten Magic.
This Avatar, shaped by the Shadow of the Dark Age, transforms into body armor when equipped. It once had supernatural powers but now only possesses transformative power.
A mysterious artifact found in the ruins of the northern continent. Legend has it that this item will give an immortal body to anyone that possess it.
This Avatar, shaped by the Shadow of the Dark Age, transforms into body armor when equipped. It once had supernatural powers but now only possesses transformative power.
A mysterious artifact found in the ruins of the northern continent. Legend has it that this item will give an immortal body to anyone that possess it.
This ring brings luck and makes you lighter.
Powerful magicians designed this ring for the Iron Calvary. Its mighty force makes you feel lighter.
This enchanted ring was designed for the Great Emperor of Ryswick. A mysterious power affects anyone that wears this ring.
A ring that possesses many different mysterious powers. Only one can be equiped at a time.
Beginner's version of skill ring. It will increase bounty and experience gained by 15%. Cannot equip the same ring simultaneously.
Silver skill ring when activated improves learning capability and battle ability. It will increase experience gained by 20%. Cannot equip the same ring simultaneously.

Gold skill ring when activated awakens battle ability and learning capability to its full potential. It will increase experience gained by 25% and max weight by 3. Cannot equip the same ring simultaneously.
A delicious looking chocolate. A small amount of both HP and AP are healed at once when eaten.
This Pouch holds three extra magazine clips.
A powerful super lightweight medical kit. Medical Kit MX-S1 heals almost twice more than MK series. (3 bundle pack)
A powerful super lightweight medical kit. Medical Kit MX-S2 heals almost twice more than MK series. (5 bundle pack)
A powerful super lightweight repair kit. Repair Kit RX-S1 heals almost twice more than RK series. (3 bundle pack)
A powerful super lightweight repair kit. Repair Kit RX-S2 heals almost twice more than RK series. (5 bundle pack)

Raw meat of an unknow animal. It seemed to have been used as food.
Cooked seasoned meat. Looks very delicious.

Iron-made earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Silver earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Gold earrings for the tribe, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
Earrings made of special metal used by the King, Kobold. Humans cannot wear them.
A necklace worn by the trial chief of Goblin. It is highly doubtful whether humans can wear it.
Doll made in the shape of the skeleton of a soldier. The taste of the maker is highly doubtful.
This doll looks exactly like Kobold! Will children be happy to get this doll?
A Goblin Doll, seems goblins like playing with dolls...
Doll that just looks like the mischievous fairy, Palmpow.
Cute doll shaped like rabbit. What is it for then?!
Stuffed animal that kids used to have on their bed. How come it is in this...?!

Ice crystal that seems not to be melted by usual heat.

The tail that Lich uses to attack. It is very sharp and flexible like a whip.
The Ice Sword used by Pamlpow when it casts magic. It seems that an unknown power is enchanted on it.
